name: Perfect Fit for Playdate
description:
Perfect Fit is a challenging and addictive arcade game that will test your reflexes and timing skills! Your goal is to guide a small cube through a sliding door by dropping it from the top of the screen. The sliding door is made up of two long, thin rectangles that move in opposite directions, creating a narrow gap for the cube to fall through. You need to time your drop just right to score points based on how small a gap you managed to get the cube through.

But be careful - the cube moves faster and faster and gets smaller and smaller as you play! If you miss the gap size or hit the sides of the door, it's game over. Can you beat your high score and become the ultimate Perfect Fit champion?Then share your score with others via the QR code on the home screen.

Features:

  • Simple gameplay - just press A to drop the cube & left and right to move the doors
  • Challenging difficulty curve that ramps up as you play
  • Addictive gameplay that will keep you coming back for more
  • Level stats & 10 achievements to unlock

Try Perfect Fit now and see if you have what it takes to become the ultimate cube dropper!
